data.contentText:
Your HCW-ID is the first 2 letters of your first name followed by first 2 letters of your surname (lower case) 
This is the same for a senior reviewer if applicable.

fields.label: Type of Health Care Worker
fields.values:
GMO,Government Medical Officer
HMO,Hospital Medical Officer
SHO,Senior House Officer
SRMO,Senior Resident Medical Officer
HCA,Health Care Assistant
MedSt,Medical Student
NS,Nursing Student
NMT,Nurse Midwife Technician 
NO,Nursing officer 
N,Nurse 
COSt,Clinical Officer Student
COIn,Clinical Officer Intern 
CO,Clinical Officer
PaeReg,Paediatric Registrar
NeoReg,Neonatal Registrar
MedReg,Medical Registrar
PaeCon,Paediatric Consultant
NeoCon,Neonatal Consultant

fields.label: Consultant on call
fields.values:
GC,Dr Gwen Chimhini
SC,Dr Simba Chimhuya
LM,Dr Lethile Madzudzo
MM,Dr Marcia Mangiza
AS, Dr Alex Stevenson

data.title: SIGNATURE
